text:
Cancer is found in a lymph node larger than 6 centimeters. Cancer may also be found anywhere in or near the maxillary sinus.            Stage IVC       In stage IVC, cancer may be anywhere in or near the maxillary sinus, may have spread to lymph nodes, and has spread to organs far away from the maxillary sinus, such as the lungs.
                
                
                    The following stages are used for nasal cavity and ethmoid sinus cancer:
                    Stage 0 (Carcinoma
